name: [Group16] Couch Divers
description:
Trailer

The Game

Couch Divers is a 2-4 player couch co-op party game, where the goal is to be the last survivor in a fast paced skydiving experience.

Story

Four friends are sleeping on a couch. When they wake up they find that they have floated into the sky by balloons! Only one of them can make it back safely! Who wil it be?!

Mechanics

If you want to survive, you'll have to eliminate your oponents! To do this, you have acces to 2 different attacks:

-Punching
 A simple punch. The amount of knockback the punch has is based on the percentage of damage the opponent has received.

-Grabbing
 The grab attack can be used to throw an opponent away or to push/pull them into an obstacle.

- Obstacles
Obstacles can do harm in various ways, like receiving damage, being stunned or obscuring your vision. Some obstacles can instantly kill you like the Plane Engine. These should be avoided at all costs.

Damage:

Instant death:

- Pickups
Feeling to weak and helpless against your oponents? Well fear not as there several powerups to make life so much easier. The glove will boost your strength and smash people further than a bionic arm could throw a ball! The thunder pickup will strike all the other players with a lightning bolt and stun them for a 1 second duration, great for timing deaths! And lets not forget the thrusty duck that will protect you with a magic buble of invinsibility!
